Package de.oth.blocklib.disasters.tornadoes

Class Tornado

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.Disaster
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.tornadoes.Tornado
public class Tornado
extends Disaster
The Tornado Disaster. A Disaster that draws nearby Entities in and whirles them upwards.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

  • Constructor Details

    • Tornado

      public Tornado​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, float radius, float height, float duration)
      Creates a new Tornado Disaster. Should be added to a DisasterManager, so it gets automatically updated.
      Parameters:
      position - the initial position of the Tornado.
      radius - the radius of the Tornado's affectedArea
      height - the height of the Tornado's affectedArea
      duration - the time the Tornado should exist before disappearing.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Description copied from class: Disaster
      Method that can be overwritten to include functionality that should be called, once the DisasterManager starts the Disaster. Is overwritten by the 'ChunkAllacatingDisaster'
      Specified by:
      start in class Disaster

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      Description copied from class: Disaster
      Method that can be overwritten to include functionality that should be called once in every frame of the BlockLib.
      Specified by:
      update in class Disaster
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time that has passed since the last update.

    • getOutwardForce

      private float getOutwardForce​(float entityHeight, float squaredDistanceFromCenter)
      Calculates whether an entity gets pushed to an outer ring of the tornado, or sucked into it
      Parameters:
      entityHeight - the absolute height of the entity (y-axis position)
      squaredDistanceFromCenter - the squared distance form the entity to the tornado center;
      Returns:
      if the distance to the center is perfect : 0, needs to go farther out : a positive value (max 1), needs to go farther in : negative value(min -1)

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished()
      Overrides:
      isFinished in class Disaster

    • getEffectArea

      public DefinedArea getEffectArea()
      Overrides:
      getEffectArea in class Disaster
      Returns:
      the area in which the disaster has non-physical influence, examples: sound, camera shaking, danger-events
